name: VSampler Soundbank File
summary: Learn about .VC3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VC3 files are saved in a compressed format that may use up to a 20:1 compression ratio. This type of compression is often used for samples transferred over the internet. VC3 files may also be saved in a lossless format that uses a compression ratio of about 2:1. The lossless compression is often used for sound archival purposes.

description: Collection of compressed sound samples for VSampler, a 255 voice polyphonic software sampler; can be loaded into the sampler and played back via software or a MIDI controller input.
